HediffDef.Name: LingFPSHediffBlank
HediffDef.description: Bionic components installed on the human body,Its efficiency will increase over time.

HediffDef.Name: LingFPSHediffBlood
HediffDef.description: The efficiency of bionic components installed on the human body will decrease with the passage of time, but the efficiency will increase with each kill.

HediffDef.Name: LingFPSHediffTurtle
HediffDef.description: A bionic component installed on the human body whose efficiency diminishes over time, but increases its efficiency each time it is attacked.

HediffDef.label: plain white protection
HediffDef.description: The effect of resonance between plain white bionics can greatly improve the ability of plain white bionic user.\nEvery five pieces of plain white bionics installed, this resonance effect will increase by one level.

HediffDef.label: red blood protection
HediffDef.description: The effect of resonance between red blood bionics can greatly improve the ability of red blood bionic user.\nEvery five pieces of red blood bionics installed, this resonance effect will increase by one level.

HediffDef.label: dark bone protection
HediffDef.description: The effect of resonance between dark bone bionics can greatly improve the ability of dark bone bionic user.\nEvery five pieces of dark bone bionics installed, this resonance effect will increase by one level.
